article: president george w. bush on thursday scrapped import tariffs he had imposed last year to help the battered u.s. steel industry , defusing a threatened trade war with europe and japan but creating political problems for himself in states that could be key in next year 's presidential election .
abstract: bush lifts steel tariffs in face of threatened trade war
